question5_key2:
User se ek `n` naam ke `variable` mein ek `integer` `input` lo.
Fir user se utni baar `input` baar ek `integer` ko `input` lo jitni `n` ki value hai.
Finally unn saare `integer` jinko user ne `input` kara hai, sum karke print karo.
question5_key3: Example: Jaise agar `n` mein user ne ki 6 daala hai toh 6 baar `input` lo.
question5_key4: `n` ki value `Kitni baar `input` lein?` waali line mein `input` li gai hai.
question5_key5: `Sum 179` isliye likha hai kyunki `10+1+56+89+11+12` ka result `179` hai.
question5_key6: Example: Jaise agar user ne `n` ki value `10` di hai toh program kuch aisa chalega. Aap koi aur numbers bhi de sakte ho `input` mein.
question5_key7: `Sum 396` isliye hai kyunki `11+7+14+76+21+34+86+5+78+64` ka result `396` hai.
